plot: A judge denies a divorce to a young couple with four children, and orders them to have no more children. The wife dies when she undergoes an illegal operation to sterilize her.
title: No More Children
plot_es: A judge denies a divorce to a young couple with four children, and orders them to have no more children. The wife dies when she undergoes an illegal operation to sterilize her.
plot_en: A judge denies a divorce to a young couple with four children, and orders them to have no more children. The wife dies when she undergoes an illegal operation to sterilize her.
